com.enhancell.remote

Interface Connection.Listener

  • Enclosing interface:
    Connection

    public static interface Connection.Listener
    Listener interface for getting notified of changes in device configuration. Interface also provides access to the GPS data reported by the client using a GpsLocation class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connectionEnded(Connection connection)
      Called when connection ends
      void deviceConnected(Device device)
      Called when new device is added to the client's device configuration.
      void deviceDisconnected(Device device)
      Called when a device is removed from the client's device configuration.
      void licenseAcquired()
      Called when device license is acquired.
      void licenseReleased()
      Called when device license is released.
      void locationUpdate(Connection connection, GpsLocation location)
      Called when new GPS location is received from the client.

    • Method Detail

      • deviceConnected

        void deviceConnected(Device device)
        Called when new device is added to the client's device configuration.
        Parameters:
        device - Device instance of the added device.

      • deviceDisconnected

        void deviceDisconnected(Device device)
        Called when a device is removed from the client's device configuration.
        Parameters:
        device - Device instance of the removed device.

      • locationUpdate

        void locationUpdate(Connection connection,
                    GpsLocation location)
        Called when new GPS location is received from the client.
        Parameters:
        connection - connection from which the update originates.
        location - GPS location information.

      • connectionEnded

        void connectionEnded(Connection connection)
        Called when connection ends
        Parameters:
        connection - connection which ends.

      • licenseAcquired

        void licenseAcquired()
        Called when device license is acquired.

      • licenseReleased

        void licenseReleased()
        Called when device license is released.
